ej,kimmb101,C,darlg901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,mcgrf001,P,darlg901,Charging mound ej,melej001,P,darlg901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,baked002,C,darlg901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,wilst002,P,darlg901,Intentional HBP $Trevor Wilson's pitch hit Fred McGriff on the leg; McGriff charged mound and Wilson threw his glove at the oncoming player; they wrestled, both benches emptied and a 15-minute brawl ensued; Gary Sheffield left with a left shoulder strain and McGriff suffered a muscle strain in his left rib cage; ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling: McGriff, Wilson, Giants coach Dusty Baker, Padres coach Bruce Kimm, Jose Melendez and Padres bullpen catcher Ron Ogelsby

ej,riddg801,M,darlg901,Intentional HBP ej,semif001,P,darlg901,Intentional HBP $both benches emptied again but no punches thrown; Frank Seminara and Padres manager Greg Riddoch ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling
